sentences.en: Don't let Tom wriggle out of helping you.
sentences.cn: 不要让汤姆借故不帮你.

sentences.en: He was helping wire up the Channel Tunnel last season.
sentences.cn: 他上一季在协助英吉利海峡隧道的电缆铺设工作.

sentences.en: His work was important in helping establish dentistry as a separate profession.
sentences.cn: 他在推动牙医学发展成一门独立学科的过程中发挥了重要作用.

sentences.en: Hypnotherapy can be useful in helping you give up smoking.
sentences.cn: 催眠疗法可能有助于你戒烟。

sentences.en: I really like the idea of helping people.
sentences.cn: 我非常赞同帮助他人的提议。

sentences.en: I'm much obliged to you for helping us.
sentences.cn: 承蒙相助，本人不胜感激。

sentences.en: Instead of helping her, his explanation only mixed her up.
sentences.cn: 他的解释不但没帮她的忙, 反而把她搞糊涂了.

sentences.en: It is not easy to make practical suggestions for helping her.
sentences.cn: 要提出切实可行的建议帮助她并不容易。

sentences.en: She experienced a joy in helping others in trouble.
sentences.cn: 她感受到了帮助有困难的人带来的快乐.

sentences.en: She lifted the boy , me helping, and carried him to a hospital.
sentences.cn: 她在我帮助下抱起那个男孩, 把他送到医院去.⑦(作主语或主语的同位语)我(=I)

sentences.en: The nurse is helping a sick person down from his bed.
sentences.cn: 护士正在搀扶一位病人下床.

sentences.en: The woman denounced her neighbor for helping the enemy.
sentences.cn: 这位妇女告发她的邻居帮助敌人.

sentences.en: These demands are helping to stoke fears of civil war.
sentences.cn: 这些要求助长了人们对内战的恐惧。

sentences.en: Three helping one another bear the burden of six.
sentences.cn: 三人互相帮忙,能挑得起六个人的担子.

sentences.en: Two men were helping police with their inquiries at Salisbury last night.
sentences.cn: 两名男子昨天夜里在索尔兹伯里接受了警方盘问。
